extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Zoom Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Zoom product is affected by retrieving the installed version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Zoom product affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Zoom Update
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Zoom product to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.16.5
Zoom VDI Client for Windows before version 5.16.10 (excluding 5.14.14 and 5.15.12)
Zoom Rooms Client for Windows before version 5.17.0
Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows before version 5.16.5
